DOC.brief_title: A Dose Escalation Trial SBRT After Induction Chemotherapy Locally Advanced Pancreatic Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This phase I study , expansion cohort , 34 patient identify maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) 3-fraction regimen stereotactic body radiotherapy ( SBRT ) locally-advanced pancreatic cancer patient develop distant progression follow induction chemotherapy ( FOLFIRINOX gemcitabine nab-paclitaxel ) per standard care . After completion induction chemotherapy , stereotactic body radiotherapy SBRT administer 3 fraction , every day , outpatient basis . Dose escalation start dose level 1 ( 9 Gy x 3 fraction ) increase 1 Gy per fraction dose level , dose level 2 10 Gy x 3 fraction dose level 3 11 Gy x 3 fraction .
